content.html: Nice job! I did a summed mono variant of this, connecting L+R from the amp through two resistors. Also, I had some weird issues toggling the power to the amp with the unit powered on. Connecting the amp to the battery instead of the VCC-5V pad.
content.text:
Nice job!
I did a summed mono variant of this, connecting L+R from the amp through two resistors. 
Also, I had some weird issues toggling the power to the amp with the unit powered on. Connecting the amp to the battery instead of the VCC-5V pad.
